name: Hephaestus
god: God of fire, metalworking, stone masonry, forges, the art of sculpture, ancient technology|technology, and blacksmiths
parent: Zeus and Hera, or Hera alone
sibling: Aeacus, Angelos (Greek mythology)|Angelos, Aphrodite, Apollo, Ares, Artemis, Athena, Dionysus, Eileithyia, Enyo, Eris (mythology)|Eris, Ersa, Hebe (mythology)|Hebe, Helen of Troy, Heracles, Hermes, Minos, Pandia, Persephone, Perseus, Rhadamanthus, the Graces, the Horae, the Litae, the Muses, the Moirai
children: Thalia (nymph)|Thalia, Erichthonius of Athens|Erichthonius, Eucleia, Eupheme (deity)|Eupheme, Philophrosyne, Cabeiri and Euthenia
